attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am sick of the uk government bailing out banks at our expense,due to fat cat bosses making bad investments or shareholders greed. we have to foot the bill.The latest was the Bank of Scotland.It was only last year they were announcing making so many millions a year profit,then less than a year later they are needing a small handout.Mr Darling needs to show some guts and tell the banks to sort out their own mess,and stop relying on the uk taxpayer to bail them out.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/interestbanks/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
